Name: WMT21 Marian translation model (ca-oc multi-task)
Description: This is a neural machine translation model for Catalan to Occitan translation. It is a multi-task model, also producing phonemic transcription of the Catalan source. The model was submitted to WMT21 Multilingual Low-Resource Translation for Indo-European Languages Shared Task as a CUNI-Contrastive system for Catalan to Occitan. The model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.
